downloadTitle: Project 2010 MVP Webcast Series slide presentations
downloadDescription: PowerPoint slides for the Microsoft Project Server 2010 IT-Professional Webcast Series training videos for the end user, IT-professional and developer audience.
detailsSection:
This download contains ten Microsoft PowerPoint presentations for the Project 2010 MVP Webcast Series of training presentations. The presentations included in this download are:
  • Project 2010 – Demand Management
  • Project 2010 – Desktop Tips and Tricks
  • Project 2010 – Enhanced Project Management Experience
  • Project 2010 – IT Professional Overview
  • Project 2010 – Portfolio Strategy
  • Project 2010 – Product Overview
  • Project 2010 – Project and Portfolio Management Reporting
  • Project 2010 – Project Professional 2010 and SharePoint Server
  • Project 2010 – Resource Management
  • Project 2010 – User-Controlled Scheduling
The Project 2010 MVP Webcast Series is a set of Project 2010 and Project Server 2010 training videos presented by both Microsoft MVPs and Microsoft internal experts. They are targeted for the end user, IT-professional, and developer audience. These videos are available to view on-demand through the Microsoft Events and Webcast site. Download and use the corresponding slide presentations to assist in your understanding of the training videos. For a comprehensive list of the Project 2010 MVP Webcast Series videos, see the TechNet article Project 2010 MVP Webcast Series. For additional technical information referenced in the slides, see the Project Server 2010 TechCenter (TechNet), the Project 2010 Resource Center (MSDN), or Project 2010 How-to and Help. For more information about Project 2010, see the Project 2010 Web site.
systemRequirementsSection: To download and read this file, you must have Microsoft Office PowerPoint 2007 or PowerPoint Viewer 2007.
installInstructionSection: Click Download to transfer the compressed file to your computer. Decompress the file, then you can open the individual .pptx files.
